text:
@Yamiche If the Govt comes up with vaccine by the end-of-year
America WAKE UP,, how long was covid19 really here?
Most scientists say it takes 18-24 months or more
To create a vaccine, test it before a cure
Follow the $$, markets, the greedy score
Govt Insiders, investors, pharma & more
